text: Hagi ofama nehanaza afupinti mago vahe'mo'ma ruotagema hu'nea ame'ama erino zaza kukena'afi erinte kafagino erino nevanigeno, ana kukenamo bretirero, kre ne'zantero, waini tintero olivi masaventero, mago'a ne'zante'ma avako'ma hanigeno'a, ana zantamimo'a ruotage hugahifi anara osugahie? Anagema hige'za pristi naga'mo'za hu'za, i'o anara osugahie hu'za hu'naze.
